name: KidsAdvice
0:
”Alexa, open Kids Advice”
”Alexa, start Kids Advice”
”Alexa, begin Kids Advice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids advice
des:
Feeling in the mood for some laughs? Use Kids Advice to hear some hilarious advice from kids. Here are some nuggets of wisdom from little ones.
 
If you want a kitten, start out by asking for a horse.

When you get a bad grade in school, show it to your mom when she's on the phone.

When your dad is mad and asks you, "Do I look stupid?" don't answer.

Tell us what you think at http://www.awesomeaariv.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
